original_text: (That also was accounted a land of giants: giants dwelt therein in old time; and the Ammonites call them Zamzummims;
korean_text: (이곳도 르바임의 땅이라 하였나니 전에 르바임이 거기 거주하였음이요 암몬 족속은 그들을 삼숨밈이라 일컬었으며

sentences.original_text: That also was accounted a land of giants
giants dwelt therein in old time
and the Ammonites call them Zamzummims
